Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to authorizing service credit in an optional twenty year retirement plan for state university police, regional state park police and detective attorney general investigator service
Summary: Relates to authorizing state university police, regional state park police and detective investigators for the office of the attorney general to receive additional service credit in an optional twenty year retirement plan.
LawCode: Amd ยง384-e, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to authorizing certain persons in an optional twenty year retirement plan to receive credit for previous service as a state university police officer, a regional state park police officer or a detective investigator for the office of the attorney general
